posts.post_content:
Prices include shipping.  Feel free to make offers.

Left-click on icon to see full-size card image:

[URL="http://runscott.homestead.com/Cards/ST206-078ChaS40b25.jpeg"][IMG]http://runscott.homestead.com/Cards/Icons/IT206Chance40.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Chance/Yellow Portrait SC 350-460 25 SGC 40 VG 3-$115.00

[URL="http://runscott.homestead.com/Cards/ST206-095CobS30.jpeg"]Cobb/Portrait-Red Polar Bear SGC 30[/URL] Good 2 - $640.00

Joss/Pitching PB SGC 40 VG 3-$100.00
Will start responding to PM's and emails in a little while.  Thanks.

All requested scans have been sent.

If I missed you, please send me an email and I'll get them right out.
Links to images have been added.  New cards will be added later this evening -hoping to add about 20-30 more, as time permits.

PMs responded to, all cards paid for through Friday were shipped Saturday morning.  Remaining ones will be shipped Monday morning.

Remaining cards will either be moved to ebay or left here.  Ungraded cards and T205s will be added to this thread this week.

Thanks for looking - I'd much rather sell these here than on ebay.

Bump for outstanding service.  Sound packaging and speedy shipping much appreciated!  Thanks Scott!

Best,

Andy

[quote name="AndyG09" post=946948]Bump for outstanding service.  Sound packaging and speedy shipping much appreciated!  Thanks Scott!

Thanks Andy!

Adding raw T206's tomorrow.
New format - does it work okay?  (Left-click on icon to see full image)
